languages.text: В результате исследования отсека была обнаружена и уничтожена Идира Тласс, предположительно являвшаяся причиной опасной варп-активности. Ситуация стабилизирована, однако свита Лорд-капитана утратила псайкера.

During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
languages.original_text: В результате исследования отсека была обнаружена и уничтожена Идира Тласс, предположительно являвшаяся причиной опасной варп-активности. Ситуация стабилизирована, однако свита Лорд-капитана утратила псайкера.

traits.locale_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

languages.text: 在检查舰船的过程中，领主舰长发现了伊迪拉·特拉斯，并将其消灭。据推测，之所以会发生这种危险的亚空间活动，直接原因就是伊迪拉。目前情况已经稳定下来，但领主舰长的随行人员中失去了一名灵能者。
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: 在检查舰船的过程中，领主舰长发现了伊迪拉·特拉斯，并将其消灭。据推测，之所以会发生这种危险的亚空间活动，直接原因就是伊迪拉。目前情况已经稳定下来，但领主舰长的随行人员中失去了一名灵能者。

languages.text: 区画の調査中に、危険な歪みの活動の推定原因がイディラ・トラスであることが判明し、打倒された。状況は安定したものの、ロード・キャプテンの従者は異能者を失った。
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: 区画の調査中に、危険な歪みの活動の推定原因がイディラ・トラスであることが判明し、打倒された。状況は安定したものの、ロード・キャプテンの従者は異能者を失った。

languages.text: Durante el registro del compartimento, se ha descubierto y destruido a Idira Tlass al ser la causa probable de la peligrosa actividad disforme. La situación se ha estabilizado, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene una psíquica menos en su séquito.
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Durante el registro del compartimento, se ha descubierto y destruido a Idira Tlass al ser la causa probable de la peligrosa actividad disforme. La situación se ha estabilizado, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene una psíquica menos en su séquito.

languages.text: Im Zuge der Untersuchung der Abteilung wurde Idira Tlass entdeckt und als vermutliche Ursache der gefährlichen Warpaktivität eliminiert. Die Lage hat sich stabilisiert, aber die Entourage des Lord Captains hat eine Psionikerin verloren.
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Im Zuge der Untersuchung der Abteilung wurde Idira Tlass entdeckt und als vermutliche Ursache der gefährlichen Warpaktivität eliminiert. Die Lage hat sich stabilisiert, aber die Entourage des Lord Captains hat eine Psionikerin verloren.

languages.text: Lors de l'examen du compartiment, Idira Tlass a été découverte et éliminée puisqu'elle semblait être la cause de la dangereuse activité du Warp. La situation s'est stabilisée, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a perdu une psyker.
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Lors de l'examen du compartiment, Idira Tlass a été découverte et éliminée puisqu'elle semblait être la cause de la dangereuse activité du Warp. La situation s'est stabilisée, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a perdu une psyker.

languages.text: Kompartımanın incelenmesi sırasında İdira Tlass bulundu ve tehlikeli öteboyut faaliyetlerine sebebi olduğu gerekçesiyle yok edildi. Durum kontrol altına alınırken Lord Kaptan'ın maiyeti de bir ruhsezer kaybetmiş oldu.
languages.original_text: During the examination of the compartment, Idira Tlass was discovered and destroyed as the presumed cause of the dangerous warp activity. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
